mitre_attack_techniques.signature_description: Checks an internet connection is available
Has permission to query the current location
Queries stored mail and application accounts (e.g. Gmail or Whatsapp)

signature_matches.description: Registers a Sensor listener (to get data about accelerometer, gyrometer etc.)
Has permission to query the current location
Connects to IPs without corresponding DNS lookups
Tries to connect to HTTP servers, but all servers are down (expired dropper behavior)
Queries stored mail and application accounts (e.g. Gmail or Whatsup)
Installs a new wake lock (to get activate on phone screen on)
Found strings which match to known social media urls
Has permission to read the phones state (phone number, device IDs, active call ect.)
URLs found in memory or binary data
Might use exploit to break dedexer tools
Checks an internet connection is available
All HTTP servers contacted by the sample do not answer. The sample is likely an old dropper which does no longer work.
May check for popular installed apps
Checks if phone is rooted (checks for test-keys build tags)
Has permission to perform phone calls in the background
Unable to instrument or execute APK, no dynamic information has been logged
Has permission to execute code after phone reboot

request_headers.User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/60.0.3112.32 Safari/537.36

ids_alerts.rule_msg: ET INFO Android Device Connectivity Check
ids_alerts.rule_raw: alert http $HOME_NET any -> $EXTERNAL_NET any (msg:"ET INFO Android Device Connectivity Check"; flow:established,to_server; urilen:13; http.method; content:"GET"; http.uri; content:"/generate_204"; fast_pattern; endswith; http.host; content:"connectivitycheck.gstatic.com"; http.accept_enc; content:"gzip"; depth:4; endswith; http.header_names; content:!"Cache"; content:!"Referer"; classtype:misc-activity; sid:2036220; rev:4; metadata:affected_product Android, attack_target Mobile_Client, created_at 2018_09_14, deployment Perimeter, deployment Internal, former_category INFO, performance_impact Low, signature_severity Informational, tag Connectivity_Check, updated_at 2023_05_01;)

T1421.description: Checks an internet connection is available

T1430.description: Has permission to query the current location

T1409.description: Queries stored mail and application accounts (e.g. Gmail or Whatsapp)
